div.head: 甘䘌
div.div: hidden worms brought forth by a consumption of sweets

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: hidden worms brought forth by a consumption of sweets

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with gan ni 疳䘌 , gan -illness with hidden worms. Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 Substance Entry da hong xia zha 大紅蝦鮓：主飛屍，蛔蟲，口中 甘䘌 , “It controls flying corpse [qi], roundworms, and hidden worms in the mouth brought forth by the consumption of sweets ”.
